description:
***** This app requires internet connection for accessing notes. ***** 

E Notes works with Evernote to enable access to your Evernote® account from webOS, this application uses the Evernote® API for accessing notes. 

Please watch the YouTube video (v1.2) for more details. 

Features: 
Add Notebooks 
Set Notebook as default 
Add Tags Add / Delete Notes 
Create / Edit To-Do Tasks 
Add Notes by E-mail (Creates note with Attachments) 
Edit Notes 
View supported Attachments 
Search Notes 
Note Preferences for sorting and listing notes 
Auto-login into account 


Please note, this note comes without any support or enhancements.

1.1.0 Changes:

Bug fix for Non-US users, users were seeing Google page.
